您好，您可以用/give @a diamond_sword 1 0 {display:{Name:"物品名",Lore:["介绍"]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:攻,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Damage}]}
来生成一把钻石剑
